scripts.dev:test_data: concurrently "npm run functions:watch" "npm run emulators:test_data_start" "npm run dev --workspace=App"
scripts.dev:prod_data: concurrently "npm run functions:watch" "npm run emulators:prod_data_start" "npm run dev --workspace=App"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=App && npm run build --workspace=Functions
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --workspace=App && npm run format:check --workspace=Functions
scripts.format:fix: npm run format:fix --workspace=App && npm run format:fix --workspace=Functions
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:check --workspace=App && npm run lint:check --workspace=Functions
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=App && npm run lint:fix --workspace=Functions
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=App && npm run test --workspace=Functions
